info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:44PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Areas of Fog Affecting the Lower Texas Coast... Surface observations,satellite data and web cam imagery indicate that areas of fog have developed along the lower Texas coastline late tonight. Some areas of locally denser fog are reducing visibilities to less than one mile, mainly on South Padre Island and the Causeway. These areas of fog will linger throughout the night and Dense Fog Advisories may be needed for the coastal portions of Deep South Texas later tonight or early Wednesday morning. Early morning motorists in South Padre Island are urged to reduce speed, use low beam headlights, and avoid following other vehicles too closely in the areas of denser fog through the late night and morning hours.
